fields.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*
> Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

fields.name: Precise Shot
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*
> Aimed Shot hits on weak spots increase Base ATK by 15% for 10s.

fields.name: Gliding Champion
fields.value:
*Unlocked Automatically*
> Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.
